metadata.title: CVE-2017-9840 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM 5.0.3 and prior allows low-privilege users to upload filesof dangerous types, which can result in arbitrary code execution within thecontext of the vulnerable application.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
